name: "CodeQL"

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
      - pull-request
    tags:
      - 'v*'
  workflow_dispatch:

concurrency:
  group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: ${{ github.ref != 'refs/heads/main' }}

jobs:
  analyze:
    name: Analyze (${{ matrix.language }})
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    timeout-minutes: 360
    permissions:
      security-events: write
      packages: read
      pull-requests: write # Required for posting comments
    
    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix:
        language: [ 'go', 'javascript-typescript' ]
        
    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Setup build environment
      uses: ./.github/actions/setup-ci-env

    - name: Initialize CodeQL
      uses: github/codeql-action/init@v3
      with:
        languages: ${{ matrix.language }}
        build-mode: manual
      env:
        CODEQL_EXTRACTOR_GO_BUILD_TRACING: on

    # Only run the build command if the language is Go
    - name: Build Go Code
      if: matrix.language == 'go'
      run: |
        echo "Building Go artifacts for CodeQL tracing..."
        make build-all

    - name: Perform CodeQL Analysis
      uses: github/codeql-action/analyze@v3
      with:
        category: "/language:${{ matrix.language }}"

    # Post results to PR (runs for each language)
    - name: Post CodeQL Results to PR
      if: startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/heads/pull-request/')
      shell: bash
      run: |
        PR_NUM="${{ github.ref }}"
        PR_NUM="${PR_NUM##*/}"
        LANGUAGE="${{ matrix.language }}"

        # Fetch alerts specific to the tool (CodeQL) and state
        ALERTS=$(gh api "repos/${{ github.repository }}/code-scanning/alerts?tool_name=CodeQL&ref=${{ github.ref }}&state=open" --jq 'length')

        # Only comment if security issues are found
        if [[ "$ALERTS" -gt 0 ]]; then
          REPORT="## üõ°Ô∏è CodeQL Analysis ($LANGUAGE)\nüö® Found **$ALERTS** open security alert(s) in this branch.\n\nüîó [View details](https://github.com/${{ github.repository }}/security/code-scanning?query=is%3Aopen+branch%3A${{ github.ref_name }}+tool%3ACodeQL)"
          echo -e "$REPORT" | gh pr comment "$PR_NUM" --body-file=-
        else
          echo "No security issues found for $LANGUAGE - skipping PR comment"
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
